name: Assassin
description: If you have this card in your hand when another player chooses you as part of a guards effect, they are knocked out of the round and you aren't. Discard this card and draw a new card.

name: Jester
description: Choose another player and give them a jester token. If they win this round, you gain an affection token.

name: Guard
description: Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number, they are knocked out of the round.

name: Cardinal
description: Choose two players. They must trade hands. Look at one of their hands.

name: Baron
description: Choose another player and secretly compare hands. Player with the lower number is out of the round.

name: Baroness
description: Choose up to two players and look at their hands.

name: Handmavalue
description: You cannot be chosen as part of the effects of another player's cards until the start of your next turn

name: Sycophant
description: Choose any player. If the next card played has an effect that requires one or more players to be chosen, they must be one of them

name: Prince
description: Choose any player. They must discard their hand and draw a new card.

name: Count
description: If this card is in your discard pile at the end of the round, add one to the number of the card in your hand. Resolve ties normally.

name: King
description: Choose another player and trade hands with them.

name: Constable
description: If this card is in your discard pile when you were knocked out of the round, gain an affection token.

name: Countess
description: If you have this card and the King or Prince is in your hand, you must discard this card.

name: Dowager Queen
description: Choose another player and secretly compare hands. Player with the higher number is out of the round.

name: Princess
description: If you discard this card, you are immediately knocked out of the round.

name: Bishop
description: Choose another player and name a number other than one. If their card is that number, gain an affection token, then they may discard their card and draw a new one. At the end of the round, the Princess beats this card.
